summary: The diff modifies Partners.tsx to display a partner photo using the path '/assets/generated/umb-photo.dim_400x400.jpg', which matches the image-edit crop requirement. However, the actual image file (frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.jpg or the dim_400x400 variant) is not present in the diff as an added file, meaning the static asset itself was never committed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.jpg
missing_requirements.reason: No image file was added in the diff. The ADDED FILES section shows 'none', so the physical asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.jpg (or umb-photo.dim_400x400.jpg) is absent. The component references the path but the file itself is never stored.
